captions.text: I'm like stranded on an island alone
Like living inside a tunnel by myself
No matter how fast I run
Nothing will happen to you today
but I'm at war each day
I'll carry everything that was so precious about you
No matter how fast I run
"Ghost In Your Mind" by Feel Kim - Punch OST #2

comments.text:
*Feel Kim(김필) 'Ghost In Your Mind(멀어진다)' Punch(펀치) OST Part. 2 MV*

A sound track for the Drama 'Punch' is by Feel Kim,  one of the finalists 
on Super Star K! Let's enjoy his enchanting voice
(iTunes: http://goo.gl/1NMo2r)

슈퍼스타K 시즌6의 고드름 보컬,  '김필'의 마성의 보이스로 감상하는 드라마 '펀치' OST '멀어진다' :) 함께 들어요!
(MelOn: http://goo.gl/ZLEKsv)

(Click to watch: http://goo.gl/G6KMFj)
#Punch #Kimfeel #김필 #MV﻿
